name: Cardlands
description:
A group of friends played games of cards, until one day, the new VR card set came in the mail. The trio all end up exiting the real world and end up getting digitized into the VR universe inside a simulated meta. Help the trio escape the world and from evil card monsters who wish to steal their bodies to enter the real world in their place.

Your device is incomplete. Go to Purplecade+ now and play at no additional cost
